review: I have a blue ray in the living room that allows us to stream Netflix and other video apps but I didn't want to buy a blue ray for every room. Well this is the best solution for that. I can stream netflix, youtube and my movies off of vudu on this very inexpensive device plus I can move it from room to room if I want to. I love it and it's easy to use.

review: You can think of this as an stripped down android of sorts, just like Apple TV is iOS base, this thing is a 1ghz processor with a 512 mb ram, it has limited rom.  Google is helping to add more apps everyday, easy to configure with almost any android.  Remember Plex is a great transcoding player, and very easy to configure.  Doggcatchers is almost finished developing Chromecast support.
